duties_responsibilities.duty: Use scientific methodologies and circuit design techniques to develop manufacturable products from a comprehensive integrated systems perspective.
Plan, manage, and execute the design, development, and integration for high-volume manufacturing of hardware components.
Work on high-power electronics design up to 90V, 1000 Watt, & 25 Amps.
Hands-on involvement with developing proof-of-concept designs, prototypes of power electronics hardware.
Analyze manufacturing options to optimally meet overall system integration requirements and objectives.
